sentences.en: The chain of volcanoes is known, appropriately enough , as the 'Ring of Fire'.
sentences.cn: 人们把这链状火山群很恰当地称作“火环”。

sentences.en: The government has been accused of not responding appropriately to the needs of the homeless.
sentences.cn: 政府未采取恰当的措施回应无家可归者的需要，为此已受到谴责。

sentences.en: The prophet appropriately appropriated the fund for repairing propeller.
sentences.cn: 提倡者恰当地为修理螺旋桨拨专款。
